trans-unit.source: Provides the security zone of a code assembly as evidence for policy evaluation.
trans-unit.target: Gir sikkerhetssonen på en kode samling som bevis for policyevaluering.

trans-unit.source: This class cannot be inherited.
trans-unit.target: Denne klassen kan ikke arves.

trans-unit.source: The presence of Zone evidence produces a <xref:System.Security.Permissions.ZoneIdentityPermission> in the grant set.
trans-unit.target: Tilstedeværelsen av sonebevis produserer en <xref:System.Security.Permissions.ZoneIdentityPermission>i tildelingen.</xref:System.Security.Permissions.ZoneIdentityPermission>

trans-unit.source: If there is a <xref:System.Security.CodeAccessPermission.Demand%2A> for <xref:System.Security.Permissions.ZoneIdentityPermission>, the <xref:System.Security.Permissions.ZoneIdentityPermission> that corresponds to the Zone evidence will be compared with the demanded permission.
trans-unit.target: Hvis det er en <xref:System.Security.CodeAccessPermission.Demand%2A>for <xref:System.Security.Permissions.ZoneIdentityPermission>, <xref:System.Security.Permissions.ZoneIdentityPermission>som tilsvarer sonen bevis vil bli sammenlignet med den nødvendige tillatelsen.</xref:System.Security.Permissions.ZoneIdentityPermission> </xref:System.Security.Permissions.ZoneIdentityPermission> </xref:System.Security.CodeAccessPermission.Demand%2A>

trans-unit.source: Zones are defined by the <xref:System.Security.SecurityZone> enumeration.
trans-unit.target: Soner er definert av den <xref:System.Security.SecurityZone>opplisting.</xref:System.Security.SecurityZone>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Security.Policy.Zone"></xref> class with the zone from which a code assembly originates.
trans-unit.target: Initialiserer en ny forekomst av den <xref href="System.Security.Policy.Zone"> </xref> klasse sonen som en kode samling stammer fra.

trans-unit.source: The zone of origin for the associated code assembly.
trans-unit.target: Sone innstilling for den tilknyttede code-samlingen.

trans-unit.source: The zone parameter is not a valid .
trans-unit.target: Den zone parameteren er ikke en gyldig .

trans-unit.source: Creates a new object that is a copy of the current instance.
trans-unit.target: Oppretter et nytt objekt som er en kopi av den gjeldende forekomsten.

trans-unit.source: A new object that is a copy of this instance.
trans-unit.target: Et nytt objekt som er en kopi av denne forekomsten.

trans-unit.source: Creates an equivalent copy of the evidence object.
trans-unit.target: Oppretter en tilsvarende kopi av bevis-objektet.

trans-unit.source: A new, identical copy of the evidence object.
trans-unit.target: En ny, identiske kopi av bevis-objekt.

trans-unit.source: Creates a new zone with the specified URL.
trans-unit.target: Oppretter en ny sone med den angitte URL-adressen.

trans-unit.source: The zone determination for the specified URL is based on the zone mapping settings in Microsoft Internet Explorer and can therefore differ from computer to computer.
trans-unit.target: Zone-fastsettelse for den angitte URL-adressen er basert på innstillingene for tilordning sone i Microsoft Internet Explorer og kan derfor være forskjellig fra datamaskin til datamaskin.

trans-unit.source: The zone mapping settings are located on the Security tab of the Internet Options dialog launched from the Tools menu.
trans-unit.target: Sone tilordning innstillingene finnes i Sikkerhet-kategorien i dialogboksen Alternativer for Internett startes fra Verktøy-menyen.

trans-unit.source: The URL from which to create the zone.
trans-unit.target: URL-adressen å opprette sonen.

trans-unit.source: A new zone with the specified URL.
trans-unit.target: Et nytt område med den angitte URL-adressen.

trans-unit.source: The url parameter is .
trans-unit.target: The url parameter is .

trans-unit.source: Creates an identity permission that corresponds to the current instance of the <xref href="System.Security.Policy.Zone"></xref> evidence class.
trans-unit.target: Oppretter en identity-tillatelse som samsvarer med den gjeldende forekomsten av den <xref href="System.Security.Policy.Zone"> </xref> bevisene klasse.

trans-unit.source: The evidence set from which to construct the identity permission.
trans-unit.target: Bevis angitt som konstruere tillatelsen identitet.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Security.Permissions.ZoneIdentityPermission"></xref> for the specified <xref href="System.Security.Policy.Zone"></xref> evidence.
trans-unit.target: En <xref href="System.Security.Permissions.ZoneIdentityPermission"> </xref> for det angitte <xref href="System.Security.Policy.Zone"> </xref> bevis.

trans-unit.source: Compares the current <xref href="System.Security.Policy.Zone"></xref> evidence object to the specified object for equivalence.
trans-unit.target: Sammenligner gjeldende <xref href="System.Security.Policy.Zone"> </xref> bevis objektet til det angitte objektet for likhet.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Security.Policy.Zone> objects are equal if they designate the same <xref:System.Security.SecurityZone>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Security.Policy.Zone>objekter er like hvis de angir samme <xref:System.Security.SecurityZone>.</xref:System.Security.SecurityZone></xref:System.Security.Policy.Zone>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Security.Policy.Zone"></xref> evidence object to test for equivalence with the current object.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref href="System.Security.Policy.Zone"> </xref> bevis objektet til å teste mot likhet med det gjeldende objektet.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the two <xref href="System.Security.Policy.Zone"></xref> objects are equal; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Hvis to <xref href="System.Security.Policy.Zone"> </xref> objekter er like, ellers, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The o parameter is not a object.
trans-unit.target: Den o -parameteren er ikke en objektet.

trans-unit.source: Gets the hash code of the current zone.
trans-unit.target: Henter hashkoden for gjeldende sone.

trans-unit.source: The hash code of the current zone.
trans-unit.target: Hashkoden for gjeldende sone.

trans-unit.source: Gets the zone from which the code assembly originates.
trans-unit.target: Henter sonen som code-samlingen stammer fra.

trans-unit.source: The zone from which the code assembly originates.
trans-unit.target: Sone som code-samlingen stammer fra.

trans-unit.source: Returns a string representation of the current <xref href="System.Security.Policy.Zone"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Returnerer en streng som representerer gjeldende <xref href="System.Security.Policy.Zone"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: A representation of the current <xref href="System.Security.Policy.Zone"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: En representasjon av gjeldende <xref href="System.Security.Policy.Zone"> </xref>.
